actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to prohibit the imposition of any deduction, cost sharing, coinsurance, enrollment fee, premium, or similar charge with respect to individuals receiving services under a State plan for medical assistance.

summary.text: Prohibits, under title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act, the imposition of any deduction, cost sharing, coinsurance, enrollment fee, premium, or similar charge with respect to individuals receiving services under a State plan for medical assistance.

titles.title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to prohibit the imposition of any deduction, cost sharing, coinsurance, enrollment fee, premium, or similar charge with respect to individuals receiving services under a State plan for medical assistance.
